original_text: “Thus says the Lord God: The gate of the inner court that faces east shall be shut on the six working days, but on the Sabbath day it shall be opened, and on the day of the new moon it shall be opened.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 안뜰 동쪽을 향한 문은 일하는 엿새 동안에는 닫되 안식일에는 열며 초하루에도 열고

sentences.original_text: The gate of the inner court that faces east
shall be shut on the six working days
but on the Sabbath day it shall be opened
and on the day of the new moon it shall be opened.
